parsed.name: Balu Andhavarapu
parsed.summary: 4th year B.Tech. Computer Science and Engineering student from VIT University with a CGPA of 9.00 and a Codeforces Rating of 1500 (approx.). Experienced in full-stack development, robotics, bug bounties, and competitive programming, demonstrated by numerous hackathon wins and high contest rankings.
skills: Python (API requests, asynchronous programming, unit testing, Flask)
Robotics (MIT Scratch, Lego, Sensors, Motors, MIT App Inventor)

experience.title: Programming Team Lead
bullets: Coded and tested Arduino embedded robots using Arduino C++ and PID algorithm.
Created a drone programming simulator to introduce programmers to robotics.

justification: The candidate is an exceptionally strong fit for an entry-level Data Engineer 1, possessing high academic achievement (9.00 CGPA) and core required technical skills (SQL, Python, AWS). Their background in competitive programming and diverse engineering projects strongly validates the required traits for excellent problem-solving, analytical skills, and rapid technology adoption. The resume meets or exceeds all technical proficiencies and behavioral requirements for a self-starter and fast learner.
